casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mollie Elizabeth B. MCDANIEL 161P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 1, 2018 Gilda C. Rodriguez, Attorney at Law, for McDaniel, Mollie Elizabeth B. Deborah Greene, Assistant Attorney General, Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of June 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of June 2018."
